block.createadditionallogistics.cash_reg: An alternative _Stock Ticker_ that records all sales into a _ledger_.
block.createadditionallogistics.package_: Allows you to change a _package's address_ using a list of rules.
Makes the _Packager_ in front of it faster, at the expense of _stress_.
createadditionallogistics.sales_ledger.t: A record of sales made at a given _Cash Register_. You can use this to quickly restock any sold items by clicking a _Stock Keeper_ with it.
